name: Just Snake (marylikesgames)
description:
JUST SNAKE was coded in 3 hours for Trijam 162: It's all connected.

I've been obsessed with Vampire Survivors and the concept of picking power-ups, so I made a classic snake game with a twist.

Credits:

  • Art and code by me :)
  • Sound effects made with sfxr
  • BGM is by Andrea Baroni a.k.a. Cyberleaf. The track is Wonderkid Theme 2 miniloop from The 8-Bit Jukebox.
  • Font is Silkscreen by Jason Kottke
